queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

SELECT Month(ft.FUELDATE) name, concat(f.WSC,' (',lc.DESCRIPTION,')') categories, Sum(If(ft.IR='I',ft.QTY,(ft.QTY)*-1)) data FROM mrqr_fuel_transactions ft INNER JOIN mrqr_assets a ON ft.ASSET = a.ASSET INNER JOIN mrqr_functions f ON a.FUNCTION = f.FUNCTION INNER JOIN mrqr_lookup_codes lc ON f.WSC = lc.CODE WHERE a.ORGANISM='pORGANISM' AND (ft.NSN='9140-12-154-7099' Or ft.NSN='9140-12-154-7099') AND lc.TYPE='WSC' and Year(ft.FUELDATE)='pYear' GROUP BY Month(ft.FUELDATE), concat(f.WSC,' (',lc.DESCRIPTION,')') HAVING Sum(If(ft.IR='I',ft.QTY,(ft.QTY)*-1))>'pTreshold' ORDER BY Month(ft.FUELDATE), Sum(If(ft.IR='I',ft.QTY,(ft.QTY)*-1)) DESC
